plugin.name: The ftp client allows you to upload and download files from a FTP server.
plugin.description:
The ftp client allows you to upload and download files from a FTP server.
A simple use case would be:
- Downloading a text file from a FTP server in order to be displayed in your application. - Uploading a text file to a FTP server.
plugin.author: Simon MacDonald
